videos.description: Terry Rozier missed his dunk attempt, but Montrezl Harrell sets up Cody Martin for a hammer dunk of his own.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cody Martin gets up for the emphatic slam) 2022/02/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cody Martin gets up for the emphatic slam

videos.description: Hamidou Diallo answers Cody Martin's dunk with a huge two-handed stuff of his own.

videos.description: LaMelo Ball throws a long-distance lob from beyond half court to Miles Bridges for the electric slam dunk.
